Class Command

java.lang.Object
group20.GameActionCommands.Command
Direct Known Subclasses:
AnswerQuestionCommand, EnterPlayerNameCommand, ExitGameCommand, GenerateEventLogCommand, GenerateReportCommand, LoadFileCommand, SelectCategoryCommand, SelectPlayerCountCommand, SelectQuestionCommand, StartGameCommand
public abstract class Command extends Object
Abstract class for the Command design pattern implementation.

  • Field Summary

    Fields
    Modifier and Type
    Field
    Description
    protected EventLogEntry
    entry
    Each command knows how to create, and stores, an EventLogEntry for process mining
    protected GameState
    state
    Commands modify GameState
    protected Instant
    timestamp
    Each command stores its timestamp of execution.

  • Field Details

    • timestamp

      protected Instant timestamp
      Each command stores its timestamp of execution. CommandInvoker calls storeTimestamp() to do so

    • state

      protected GameState state
      Commands modify GameState

    • entry

      protected EventLogEntry entry
      Each command knows how to create, and stores, an EventLogEntry for process mining

      public abstract void execute() throws CommandExecutionException
      Throws:
      CommandExecutionException

    • createEventLogEntry

      protected abstract void createEventLogEntry()
      Creates an EventLogEntry object and stores it in the entry field. Called at the end of every execute().
